DataElement.preferredName: Cosmetic Product Material Name Code Change Text ISO21090.ST.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An article intended to be rubbed, poured, sprinkled, or sprayed on or introduced into or otherwise applied to the human body for cleansing, beautifying, promoting attractiveness or altering the appearance. A character string that is a revision of the original text of the product to enable the coding of the text. EXAMPLE(S): If the original text is "aspriin", the nameCodeModifiedText could be set to "aspirin", so that the text can be successfully coded.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cosmetic Product Material Name Code Change Text
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A substance that is intended to be applied to the body to promote attractiveness without affecting the body's structure or functions.:The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object._The words or language units by which a thing is known.:A symbol or combination of symbols which is given an arbitrary meaning within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation.:The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.:The words of something written.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A substance that is intended to be applied to the body to promote attractiveness without affecting the body's structure or functions.:The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object.

Concepts.definition: An immunotoxin containing epitope of Pseudomonas exotoxin (PE) with immunotherapeutic property. PE, a peptide toxin of 613 amino acids, consists of 3 functional domains: an amino-terminal receptor-binding domain, a middle translocation domain, and a carboxyl-terminal ADP-ribosylation domain. The last 5 carboxyl-terminal amino acids, Arg-Glu-Asp-Leu-Lys, are critical for its cytotoxic action.
The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.
The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object.

Property.preferredDefinition: The words or language units by which a thing is known.:A symbol or combination of symbols which is given an arbitrary meaning within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation.:The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.:The words of something written.

Concepts.definition: The words or language units by which a thing is known.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.
The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.
